media:group.media:title: Drawing Objects in Perspective
media:group.media:description:
My Digital Art for Beginners Course: http://bradsartschool.com

Drawing in perspective can get tricky as objects get more complicated. How do you draw circles in perspective? How do you draw angled lines in perspective? How to you draw cars in perspective? Buildings? furniture? Rooms? Giraffes? In this lesson we break down how to use basic shapes to construct more complex illustrations.

http://www.bradsartschool.com for the grids used in this lesson
